Microsoft products. Steve Ballmer has already said that PC support is coming. Here he's just reaffirming that the Kinect is Microsoft's answer to the Wii, and the casual gaming market in general. Q: What has stopped you from making really bold bets on technology? You've got more than$ 40 billion on the balance sheet. If you want to have substantial market share in smartphones, why not just acquire Research In Motion, maker of the BlackBerry? A: We've made bold technology bets. We've bet on the Cloud and our Enterprise business; it's going fantastic. We made the bet on Xbox; we made the bet on Kinect.

Comment on this Article She said: Having Katie Price on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid- faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .

' A promise kept' "Some in the cynical political class are saying this is a gimmick, an empty gesture," said Indiana Rep. Mike Pence , a possible Republican presidential candidate. We on the other side call it a promise kept. That refrain was repeated by Republicans often during the House debate.
